text: Typhoon Kong-rey or also known as Super Typhoon Leon was category 4 powerful tropical cyclone, that swept the north Philippines particularly in extreme Northern Luzon, after Tropical Storm Kristine, It is the nineteenth typhoon of the Pacific Ocean, and the twelfth typhoon in the annual set of the Philippines by the third week of October in 2024.https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/balitambayan/balita/925640/leon-palabas- na-ng-par-pero-batanes-hinagupit-nang-dumaan/story ==Meteorological== In October 24, after the impact of Severe Tropical Storm Kristine in Northern Luzon, the circulation formed as low pressure area in Guam according to the JMA and the JTWC. Approaching in the islands of Batanes.https://news.abs- cbn.com/regions/2024/10/30/leon-now-a-super-typhoon-1029 ===Retirement=== On February 2025 PAGASA decided that the name of Leon, decommissioned from its rotating annual list, along with Aghon, Enteng and Julian, that hit Extreme northern luzon. Causing P1 billion due to Tropical Storm Kristine. And replaced the name with in 2028 annual list. ==Typhoon Storm Warning Signal== PSWS LUZON PSWS #5 Basco, Batanes PSWS #4 Itbayat, Batanes PSWS #3 Calayan, Cagayan PSWS #2 nalalabing Cagayan, nalalabing Isabela PSWS #1 Abra, Apayao, Ilocos Norte, Ilocos Sur, Kalinga, La Union, Mountain Province ==References== Category:2024 in weather Category:Pacific typhoons Category:2024 disasters in Asia
title: Typhoon Kong-rey (2024)
